text: @cspan @Jim_Jordan Why is the US politicizing the fight against #coronavirus? Serious?! #Fauci is in a kind of trial 24/7 where questions are being asked by people who only like to give answers themselves. So sad... This man deserves more. Difference between #advising and #governing. 🙄
